title: The Edinburgh tales.
author: Johnstone, C. I.
snippet: Mr. Hepburn requested, on this night, that his friends should sing with him and his children, the scriptural paraphrase of the chapter which he called on his son, Charles, to read, the vision of the Patriarch, as he journeyed to Padanaram, the covenant pillar of Bethel.
